alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 10:27AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Calhoun and central Orangeburg Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1027 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orangeburg County Airport, or near Orangeburg, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, Elloree, Orangeburg County Airport, Santee State Park, Claflin College, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, Santee, Cameron, Rowesville, Cordova, Cope, Poplar Creek Landing, Stumphole Landing, Yonder Field, Wilkinson Heights, Edisto, Creston and Lone Star. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 147 and 161. Interstate 95 between mile markers 96 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
